title: [救助][BedwarsRel]聊天格式修改
author: 我觉得很淦
txt_content:
[11:26:49 ERROR]: [BedwarsRel] The updater could not contact dev.bukkit.org for updating.
[11:26:49 ERROR]: [BedwarsRel] If you have not recently modified your configuration and this is the first time you are seeing this message, the site may be experiencing temporary downtime.
[11:26:49 ERROR]: [BedwarsRel] null
java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out
        at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.waitForConnect(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_191]

        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_191]
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDeleg ... on.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_191]
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect0(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_191]
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_191]

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_191]
能用是能用 但是会重置聊天格式

replies.author: xsfcaDcsa
replies.txt_content: 这个是自动更新的bug 配置文件可以关闭

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这段报错是起床插件的自动更新所引起的。

尝试在配置文件中关闭它

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
打开plugins/BedwarsRel/config.yml用Ctrl+F查找update
将他后面的选项改为false
